content.content:
Happy Birthday Sohyun! 
박쌤 생일 축하해! 

I hope you have a wonderful birthday!
You have inspired me a lot to be a better person.
Through your hard work and dedication, you have positively influenced a lot of people, including me.
Through your messages, you helped me realize that I'm not alone, especially in difficult times.
This time, I hope I could do the same.
Thank you for being you.
Wishing you good health, success, and all the best.

항상 응원할게! 박쌤 최고!
